amendment.description: Amendment makes available such funds as may be necessary to implement audits of energy use in order to comply with the Department's energy management requirements of the National Energy Conservaion Policy Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment which states that such funds under the provisions of this amendment be made available for the Secretary of Energy to comply with the Department's energy management requirements of the National Energy Conservaion Policy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Welch.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
